movie_title: Your Time Machine Broke - At The Worst Time In History
introduction: Go to https://brilliant.org/nutshell/ to dive deeper into these topics and more with a free 30-day t
lead_intro: Imagine being stuck in the ancient Earth during extreme climates, from scorching deserts to alien jungles. Test your knowledge about these prehistoric environments!

quiz.question: During the early Triassic hot house, the planet was still suffering from a permanent fever due to which of the following factors?
quiz.explanation: The text mentions that volcanism and the runaway greenhouse effect transformed the planet into a hellish environment during this time.

quiz.question: What caused the gigantic ocean to be warmed even deep below during the early Triassic period?
quiz.explanation: Two superheated currents circulated around the globe, pumping extreme amounts of heat and moisture into the atmosphere during this period.

quiz.question: What characterized the Lake Carboniferous period 320 million years ago?
quiz.explanation: During this period, the climate was locked in a neverending wet super summer without any other seasons, providing a paradise for plants and a huge variety of life.

quiz.question: What dominated the lands during the early Devonian period 400 million years ago that made the world truly alien?
quiz.explanation: Massive obelisks of fungal prototaxes reaching up to 8 meters high dominated the lands during this period, creating a truly alien landscape.

quiz.question: What tool is highlighted as the most important for rebuilding civilization in the Brilliant ad?
quiz.explanation: The ad emphasizes that while tools like a hammer and saw are handy, the most important tool needed for rebuilding civilization is your mind, which can be enhanced through Brilliant's interactive lessons.
